name: chemkin_reaction
description: Description of a thermodynamical reaction with rate constant: k(T) = A * T**b * exp(-Ea/(R*T)) where A, b and Ea are parameters, T the temperature and R the molar gas constant (8.31451 J/(mol K)).  See http://www.frad.t.u-tokyo.ac.jp/public/chemkin/CKm_inp.html.en for more details.

dimensions.name: ntroe
dimensions.description: Number of parameters for evaluating the pressure dependence using Troe's formula.  Can be 0 (not used), 3 or 4.

dimensions.name: nenhancement_factors
dimensions.description: Number of enhancement factors.  Zero indicates that they are not used.

dimensions.name: nplog
dimensions.description: Number of intervals the pressure dependency of the rate coefficients is described.  May be zero for no pressure dependency.

properties.name: third_body
properties.description: Whether the reaction occurs in precense of catalytical third-body (e.g. a surface).

properties.name: A
properties.description: Preexponential factor in the rate constant. [FIXME define the unit. As formulated in the documentation of the CHEMKIN II file format, it depends on b and the reaction order... consider use a saner expression for the reaction constant for this entity.]

properties.name: b
properties.description: Parameter in the rate constant, see entity description.

properties.name: A_low
properties.description: Preexponential factor for the low-pressure limit.  Support fillvalues.  FIXME: define the unit.

properties.name: b_low
properties.description: Value of b in the low-pressure limit.  Support fillvalues.

properties.name: Ea_low
properties.description: Activation energy in the low-pressure limit.  Support fillvalues.

properties.name: troe
properties.description: Parameters a, T***, T* and T** when using Troe's formula to express pressure dependency.  The last parameter T** is optional.

properties.name: enhancement_species
properties.description: Name of species in the buffer gas corresponding to the enhancement_factors.

properties.name: enhancement_factors
properties.description: Enhancement factors for describing dependency of the rate parameters on the buffer gas.

properties.name: P_plog
properties.description: Pressures defining the borders of the nplog pressure intervals for defining pressure dependency of the rate constant.  Should be increasing.

properties.name: A_plog
properties.description: Preexponential factors for pressure dependency of the rate constant.  FIXME: define the unit.

properties.name: b_plog
properties.description: Values of b for pressure dependency of the rate constant.

properties.name: Ea_plog
properties.description: Activation energy for pressure dependency of the rate constant.
